version_description: • Other minor enhancements / fixes

• Configurable widget lets you conveniently view and control key devices and trigger Scenes from the Today Screen, without needing to open the app.
• Minor enhancements / fixes

• Configurable Today Screen widget lets you view and control devices and trigger Scenes from outside the app.
• Minor enhancements / fixes

• Support for the split view multitasking feature on iPad allows the iPad app to resize accordingly when viewed side by side with another app.
• Other minor enhancements / fixes
• Minor enhancements / fixes
• Minor enhancements / fixes

• We’ve updated the app design with a more modern look and new icons.
• Other minor enhancements / fixes

• Commercial customers can now access Commercial Reports and view Location Open/Close Status based on Business Hours (e.g., “Opened Late” or “Closed Early”).
• Pinch to digitally zoom in or out of a particular area of interest on the live view camera f

• The push notification sent to the app when someone rings the doorbell is now accompanied by a doorbell sound, letting you know that someone is at the door.
• Download and share saved video clips and images directly from the app.
• Other minor enha
• Minor enhancements / fixes

• Enhancements to Doorbell Camera Screen - In addition to being able to unlock the door from the Doorbell Camera screen in the middle of a call, you can now disarm the security system too. You’re also able to re-lock the door at the end of the call.
• Minor enhancements / fixes

• Face ID - Support for Apple’s new Face ID feature on iPhone X, for quick and secure access to the app without a passcode.
• Compatibility updates for iPhone X.
• Other minor fixes and enhancements.
• Minor enhancements / fixes

• Apple Watch Updates - Support for watchOS 3.1 and up allows an improved watch experience. Commands now can be sent without the phone present, as long as the watch is connected (Wi-Fi or cellular). A new app launcher watch complication allows quick app a

• Video Enhancements - Swipe to easily switch between video cameras. View multiple cameras at once on the redesigned video feature screen.
• Other minor enhancements / fixes

• Video Enhancements - Swipe to easily switch between video cameras. View multiple cameras at once on the redesigned video feature screen.

• Video Enhancements - Swipe to easily switch between video cameras. View multiple cameras at once on the redesigned video feature screen.
• Other minor enhancements / fixes

• Apple Watch Updates - Support for watchOS 3.1 and up allows an improved watch experience. Commands now can be sent without the phone present, as long as the watch is connected (Wi-Fi or cellular). A new app launcher watch complication allows quick app a
Minor enhancements / fixes

• Interface improvements for the Image Sensor. For the latest (version 3) Image Sensor, the app now automatically scrolls through the frames, creating an animation of each captured event. Pause and start the image playback by tapping on the image.
• M

• Interface improvements for the Image Sensor. For the latest (version 3) Image Sensor, the app now automatically scrolls through the frames, creating an animation of each captured event. Pause and start the image playback by tapping on the image.

• Minor enhancements / fixes
• Minor enhancements / fixes

• Under App Settings, iOS 12 users can now set up voice shortcuts to control the alarm system via Siri. You can also choose to share your in-app activity so that Siri can recommend commonly used actions on your lock screen, or Spotlight Search.
• Minor

• Create, view, or edit security system and lock user codes through the new Users screen, available in the navigation menu of the app.
• A new Login Information screen, available in the navigation menu of the app, lets you link multiple systems to a si

• Support for the new iPad Pro screen size
• Minor enhancements / fixes

• An enhanced notifications experience lets you more easily manage your push notifications. Now you can enable, disable, and add new notifications from a single screen

• Critical Alerts - With this feature enabled, Alarm event notifications to the app will play a sound, even if your phone is muted or in Do Not Disturb mode. Manage in your phone’s Settings menu under Notifications.

• Quick swipe between systems

• Critical Alerts - With this feature enabled, Alarm event notifications to the app will play a sound, even if your phone is muted or in Do Not Disturb mode. Manage in your phone’s Settings menu under Notifications.

• Quick swipe between systems

• Scenes on Apple Watch - Now you can run Scenes right from your Apple Watch for maximum convenience, comfort, and control.

• Behind the scenes improvements to power future features.

• Minor enhancements and bug fixes, including:

• Shade control has been separated from Lights and now has its own dashboard card and screen
• Behind the scenes improvements to power future features.

Minor bug fixes and enhancements, including:

• Updated camera selector on video feature screen to be more obvious.
• Addressed multi system swipe UI issue during iPad multitasking
• Behind the scenes improvements to power future features

• Today Widget for Lights
Now you can control your lights directly from the Today View. Set up this feature under the App Settings tab in the lefthand navigation.

• View Cameras with Siri Shortcuts

• Trouble Condition Info - when there is a system issue (e.g., low battery), you can now tap the issue card to get more information and easy steps to address it.
• System Search - Customers with more than 10 linked systems can now leverage search on t

Minor UI enhancements and bug fixes, including:

• Swipe down with 2 fingers to quickly select multiple saved clips at once on the video or doorbell screen. (iOS 13 and up)
• Fixed

Doorbell Call Screen Enhancements - Access additional actions from the Doorbell call screen. Now you can arm your system as well as control lights, garage, and access control doors — all without leaving an active doorbell call.

Behind the scenes i

• Home Screen Quick Actions - Users with a doorbell camera can now set up a Home Screen Quick Action via the App Settings menu, to start a doorbell call from the app launcher icon.

• Behind the scenes improvements to power future features

• Control Lights with Siri Shortcuts - Under App Settings, you can now set up a voice shortcut to control your lights and light groups via Siri.

• You can now create Siri Shortcut commands to control "All Lights" under App Settings.
